title: Design and Implementation of a Telelearning-Based Instructional Design Support Environment

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of secondary education and basic understanding of instructional design theory
context.additional_context: Targeting Pre-Service and In-Service Teachers, Aiming to Strengthen Instructional Design Competencies in Utilizing Telelearning Tools in Simulation/VR Environments

learning_goals: Learners can design an online learning environment reflecting instructional design principles using telematics tools.
Learners can develop instructional modules applying learner engagement strategies in simulation/VR-based environments.
Learners can validate the feasibility and effectiveness of instructional design projects through peer evaluation and coaching.

resources: Access to VR Devices and Telematics Platforms
Instructional design templates and assessment rubrics

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
